name: Ultimate Ears MEGABLAST - Speaker - for portable use - wireless - Bluetooth, Wi-Fi - blue steel | Dell USA
description: Meet Ultimate Ears MEGABLAST, an incredibly powerful portable Wi-Fi/Bluetooth speaker with big, bassy 360° sound and hands-free voice control. Now with Amazon Alexa built-in, you and your crew can blast tunes, discover new music, order takeout, and more, with just the power of your voice. Do it all at home or on-the-go, even take calls without killing the music whenever connected to Wi-Fi or a mobile hotspot. MEGABLAST is waterproof, rugged, and stunning too - go from cocktail party to the pool party with confidence and style. Just say it to play it with MEGABLAST from Ultimate Ears.
